============================
Title : Agreements & Delcarations
Tags  : #imp
Descr :
============================

1971
	- Ramsar Convention on Wetlands

1972
	- Stockholm Conference
	- Conventions concerning the protection of World Curltural and Natural Heritages

1973
	- CITES

1979
	- Convention on Migratory Species of Wild Animals (CMS, *Bonn Convention*)

1980
	- World Conservation strategy

1982
	- Nairobi Declaration
	- World Charter of Nature

1985
	- Vienna Convention for Ozone Layer

1987
	- Montreal Protocol for ODS

1989
	- Helsinki Declaration
	- BAsel Convention of Hazardous Wastes

1992
	- Earth Summit
	- UNFCCC
	- CBD

1994
	- UN Convention of Desertification

1997
	- Kyoto Protocol

2000
	- Stockholm Convention on POPs

2002
	- Johannesburg Declaration

2005
	- UN World Summit

2007
	- Bali Summit on Climate Change
